creator: LARK TECHNOLOGIES PTE. LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Lark is a next-generation office suite that integrates messaging, schedule management, collaborative documents, video conferencing, and many more applications in a single platform.

Built for the era of mobile Internet, Lark works as well on desktop as it does on your phone.

With Lark, you can:
- Communicate with your team either privately or in groups through Lark's powerful Messenger
- Create and share content through Docs, where you can work together on documents and spreadsheets with teammates in real time
- Stay on top of your schedule using our Calendar. From any meeting invite, you can create a group chat, launch a video call, or create a meeting memo
- With a single click, start a video or audio call to connect with colleagues, anytime, anywhere
- Manage your team's internal workflow (such as reimbursements and annual leave) with our Approval and Attendance apps
- Keep using the tools and services you love with plugins from Jira, GitHub, Asana, and so much more
- The best part? The features above are deeply integrated and can talk to each other, so you can do cool things like: Insert a group chat in a Doc, check teammembers' schedules right from a chat, launch a video call right from a calendar event...

Give your team the tools they need to do their best work.

Get started for free at: http://larksuite.com

Any feedbacks, suggestions or just want to say hi? Please reach out to contact@larksuite.com.
descriptionShort: Lark combines Chat, Calendar, Docs, and Apps for a truly unified work experience

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- You can now share a group link to invite friends to join Lark group chats.
- You can invite external users to join group chats via group card or QR code.
- You can invite friends to join your team by sharing a Team Code.
- You can easily join teams via Team Code or Invite QR Code after clicking "Join a Team" on the signup page.
- You can invite Lark users to join your team by sharing a link from "Invite" on your profile page.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- You can now record a call or meeting.
- You can now share Docs and Sheets by Magic Share during calls or meetings.
- You can now have subtitles with English-Chinese translation during calls and meetings.
- The host of a call or meeting can now set joining permissions to increase the safety of the call or meeting.
- You can now use the integrated chat to send messages and emojis during calls and meetings.
- You can now generate an ID and link for scheduled meetings ahead of time.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
[Calls and Meetings]
- Livestream can now display all types of files shared using Magic Share during video meetings.
- You can now send live chat messages when watching a livestream on mobile.
- Once a livestream ends, the person who started it now receives a notification with relevant statistics.
[Calendar]
-You can add guests by entering their email addresses when creating an event.

Improvements:
- Magic Share content can be recorded during calls and meetings.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- You can turn off message notifications during calls and meetings in Settings.
- You can now join a call or meeting by phone.
- Docs that are set be shared externally, now allow external users to directly request permission from the document owner.
- Visitors can access Docs via public link and can edit without logging in to Feishu.

Improvements:
- Docs new template gallery now includes a category search function and more than 60 new templates in 6 themes.

descriptionHtml:

Built for the era of mobile Internet, Lark works as well on desktop as it does on your phone.

With Lark, you can:
- Communicate with your team either privately or in groups through Lark's powerful Messenger
- Create and share content through Docs, where you can work together on documents and spreadsheets with teammates in real time
- Stay on top of your schedule using our Calendar. From any meeting invite, you can create a group chat, launch a video call, or create a meeting memo
- With a single click, start a video or audio call to connect with colleagues, anytime, anywhere
- Manage your team's internal workflow (such as reimbursements and annual leave) with our Approval and Attendance apps
- Keep using the tools and services you love with plugins from Jira, GitHub, Asana, and so much more
- The best part? The features above are deeply integrated and can talk to each other, so you can do cool things like: Insert a group chat in a Doc, check teammembers' schedules right from a chat, launch a video call right from a calendar event...

Give your team the tools they need to do their best work.

Get started for free at: http://larksuite.com

Any feedbacks, suggestions or just want to say hi? Please reach out to contact@larksuite.com.
descriptionShort: Lark combines Chat, Calendar, Docs, and Apps for a truly unified work experience

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
[Docs]
- You can slide on mobile to comment, copy and cut a paragraph or sheet, and so on.
- You can export Docs in a Word or PDF file, and Sheets in an Excel file to easily share them with others on mobile.
Improvements:
- Light mode is now available in video meetings to bring you a brand new user experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- You can grant permission to departments in your organization to view and edit documents and folders.
- The host can enable language interpretation and add interpreters during meetings. Participants can listen to different language channels.
- You can now integrate custom features to the message menu by adding Message Shortcuts.
Improvements:
- You can now select up to 50 languages in code block and use Markdown to switch coding languages.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
- Follow documents to receive notifications when their content is updated.
- View text links and web cards inserted into documents to have a glance at their content.
- View all meeting and call records by clicking the Meetings tab on the navigation bar.
- Authors can edit and send short texts and images in Feishu Subscriptions.
Improvements:
- Save frequently used Docs or Sheets as custom templates on mobile, and share them with others.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- You can filter your feed by chat type! Select and rearrange filters to keep track of your most important messages.

Improvements:
- Skip silent clips when replaying recorded videos or audio files in Feishu Minutes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
[Messenger]
- You can send, receive, and open entire folders in chats without compressing or downloading them.
[Storage Management]
- Cache Management in Settings is now called Storage Management, and a Reset feature is added to easily clear storage space and fix bugs.

- The "New members can see chat history" option can be turned off by group owners.
- You can upload images and videos to Bitable on mobile.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
[Messenger]
- A complete visual overhaul of Lark is here for you to explore.
[Docs]
- Bitable's "advanced permissions" allows you to set custom combo of view and edit permissions. Turn it on to share info securely and with flexibility.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:​
[Docs]​
- Toggle on Follow Comment to get notified about new comments and replies posted to documents.​
- With the upgraded charts, you can visualize your data even better. The following chart types are supported: column, line, pie, bar, scatter, combo, and more!​
[Meetings]​
- For more secure control, you can now set up a meeting in advance while creating the event.

Built for the era of mobile Internet, Lark works as well on desktop as it does on your phone.

With Lark, you can:
- Communicate with your team either privately or in groups through Lark's powerful Messenger
- Create and share content through Docs, where you can work together on documents and spreadsheets with teammates in real time
- Stay on top of your schedule using our Calendar. From any meeting invite, you can create a group chat, launch a video call, or create a meeting memo
- With a single click, start a video or audio call to connect with colleagues, anytime, anywhere
- Manage your team's internal workflow (such as reimbursements and annual leave) with our Approval and Attendance apps
- Keep using the tools and services you love with plugins from Jira, GitHub, Asana, and so much more
- The best part? The features above are deeply integrated and can talk to each other, so you can do cool things like: Insert a group chat in a Doc, check teammembers' schedules right from a chat, launch a video call right from a calendar event...

Give your team the tools they need to do their best work.

Get started for free at: http://larksuite.com

Any feedbacks, suggestions or just want to say hi? Please reach out to contact@larksuite.com.
descriptionShort: Lark combines Chat, Calendar, Docs, and Apps for a truly unified work experience

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:​
[Docs]​
- Toggle on Follow Comment to get notified about new comments and replies posted to documents.​
- With the upgraded charts, you can visualize your data even better. The following chart types are supported: column, line, pie, bar, scatter, combo, and more!​
[Meetings]​
- For more secure control, you can now set up a meeting in advance while creating the event.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:​
[Calendar]​
- With one click, you can easily create a similar or identical event by copying an existing one.​
[Docs]​
- Let templates help your team work more efficiently. Share any templates with team members, groups, or insert them in Docs.​
[Meetings]​
- In-meeting chats can now be translated into multiple languages. You can turn on the automatic translation or manually select any specific content to translate for smoother and easier communication.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
[Messenger]
- Format your messages with bold, italics, underline, strikethrough text, or present them in hyperlinks and charts.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
[Shortcut]
- Add the new Lark widget to your home screen and place your frequently-used tools in the widget, such as Scan, Search or Workplace.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What's New:
[Messenger]
- Try the updated Feed Filter and the new three-column layout on desktop. Switch quickly between frequently-used filters to view and manage chats more efficiently on mobile.

title: Lark - Work, Together

creator: LARK TECHNOLOGIES PTE. LTD.
descriptionHtml:
Best team collaboration tool

Make team communication effortless with the Lark all-in-one collaboration tool. No more wasting time toggling between multiple programs and documents. With Lark you have everything you need in one spot, helping your team be successful no matter where they're located.

Lark offers an affordable collaboration suite with prices starting at $12 per seat.


Main features of the Lark collaboration suite

Built-in chat and messenger
Docs with easy-to-use templates
Video meetings
Simple calendar
Email
Approval system
Powerful no code apps through Base
Easy to set up wikis
OKR tracker
Magic Share


Improving team efficiency with Lark

Lark is the perfect solution for global teams or businesses that are looking to centralize all of their tools into one platform. Globally distributed teams can use Lark's productivity app to communicate across languages and time zones.


Why chose Lark

Excellent reviews on iOS from more than 1,700 real customers – 4.9 out of 5 stars
State-of-the-art collaboration tool reduces the need for entire suites
Save time by having everything your team needs in one place
Affordable all-in-one solution saves companies money
Auto-translation for video meetings and chat empowers easy global communication
Intuitive easily adopted by all skill levels
Try Lark for free


Our customers love sharing

"Best collaboration software ever used! It’s the most comprehensive enterprise tool in existence." - infraguru

"I am a consultant and have used all of the popular collaborations tools in the market (ex: Google Suite, FB Workplace, Slack, Zoom, etc). Lark’s functionality incorporates all the pros of the rest of aforementioned tools, super easy to use, and truly centralize everything a employee need to use/look for within one platform. It’s absolutely a phenomenal product!" - Rocket Racoon 1118

"Would be frustrating having to switch from Gmail to Slack, then back to google calendar then having to download Google Docs, open document, forward it to a specific person then on and on and on. If that resonates with you or your team in anyway, Lark is a life saver. One platform with everything your team needs!" - Jimmy_lee2430


Contact

If you have any questions, please email us at hello@larksuite.com
